text: Ona get half z co tvoj manzelka vlavo they nie had dieta. they had dieta ona get one-fourth z co they lavy. All this after fulfilling any will they lavy after platit off all debts. They get one-fourth z co ona vlavo ona nie had dieta. Ona had dieta they get one-eighth z co ona bequeath All this after fulfilling any will ona lavy after platit off all debts. If zomrela clovek zensky bol loner vlavo 2 siblings muzsky zenska each z them gets one-sixth inheritance! there bol inak siblings potom they equally share one-third inheritance. All this after fulfilling any will after platit off all debts so ze ziaden 1 zranit. This will decreed GOD GOD bol Omniscient Clement
